title: Navigation — Fix active tab highlighting
description: Fix incorrect active tab highlighting where Profile Extract and Viral Library highlight the Mood Board tab. After removal of those pages, ensure all remaining tabs highlight correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page has independent active state in sidebar
Correct tab highlights on page load
No shared layout container causing mis-highlighting

steps.description: Audit sidebar nav active state logic
steps.details: Check the admin sidebar component. Look at how active state is determined — likely by comparing pathname to href. Identify if Profile Extract and Viral Library share a route prefix with Mood Board.

Ensure each nav item uses exact match or proper startsWith logic. If moodboard is /admin/moodboard and profile extract is /admin/moodboard/profile, the startsWith logic would match both — fix by using more specific matching.
After TASK-32 removes Profile Extract and Viral Library, verify all remaining tabs highlight correctly. Test by clicking each sidebar item.

technicalNotes: Root cause is likely that /admin/moodboard/profile startsWith /admin/moodboard — need exact or segment-aware matching
